title: TPACK-Integrated Instructional Design for Mobile-Based Research Methodology Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A course for enhancing language research competencies of professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Applies project-based assessment and peer mentoring systems.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core elements of qualitative research methodologies (sampling, data collection) with over 80% accuracy via a mobile platform within two weeks.
Learners can complete research design projects incorporating peer feedback, improving self-efficacy by over 30%.
Learners engage in critical-thinking-based research discussions at least twice weekly in mobile discussion forums.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
